entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late this morning and early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
